channel.title: Comments on: HP’s cards are finally on the table, but not all of them are good.
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Deemable
item.dc:creator: Deemable
item.description: Whoops, what a goof! Thanks for catching that. Thanks for the compliment also.
item.content:encoded: Whoops, what a goof! Thanks for catching that. Thanks for the compliment also.

item.title: By: johnfromunix
item.dc:creator: johnfromunix
item.description:
"...such as the new Time Inc, magazines, the Kindle app, and Open Office." <-- I think you mean "QuickOffice"
Good analysis and I love the "jokers" analogy.
item.content:encoded:
“…such as the new Time Inc, magazines, the Kindle app, and Open Office.” <– I think you mean "QuickOffice"

Good analysis and I love the "jokers" analogy.
